casebody.data:
2002-1690 (La. 10/25/02)

LAMSON PETROLEUM CORPORATION v. HALLWOOD PETROLEUM INC., et al. No. 2002-C-1690. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Union Oil Co. of CA; PetroCorp Incorporated; Triton Oil & Gas Corp.; Jefcoat, Johnny; Jefcoat, Mildred; — Defendants); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Lafayette, 15th Judicial District Court Div. B, No. 95-2601; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-1201.

Denied.

VICTORY, J., to grant and docket.
